title: Fiction At My Fingertips
description: Lois is a voracious writer. To say that she is a budding writer would be the understatement of the millennium. Recounts about her family vacations, ooze out the very pores of her skin before becoming transplanted in the pages of her trusty journal. When her language arts teacher, Ms. Williams, informs the class that they will be participating in The Hillcrest Young Adult Golden Quill Contest for Fiction, Lois is catapulted into the stratosphere. However, an unfortunate mishap could derail Loisâ€™ literary debut.   ~~Hear Ye, Hear Ye, Fiction Writers Raise Your Quills!
author: C.S. Reid
